name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Full-Stack Software Engineer skilled in **Java**, **Spring**, **Spring Boot**, and **Angular** with a proven ability to develop scalable and reliable applications. Proficient in **CI/CD** tools such as **Jenkins**, **BitBucket**, and **Ansible**, ensuring seamless deployments and efficient workflows. Experienced with **ElasticSearch**, **JUnit**, **Mockito**, and testing frameworks like **Cucumber** and **Selenium** to deliver quality software solutions. Demonstrated expertise in both **Microservices Architecture** and **Monolith Architecture**, adept in environments utilizing **Kubernetes**, **Windows**, and **Linux**. Recognized for delivering significant enhancements in healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors through innovative technology solutions, automation, and a commitment to clean code.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Java** with **Spring Boot** to design a microservices-based Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS), achieving **95%** accuracy in patient tracking and significantly enhancing adherence rates through automated reminders.
Developed robust RESTful APIs leveraging **Spring Data JPA**, which improved data accuracy by **40%** and ensured secure EHR integration using **Spring Security** and **OAuth2**.
Enhanced UI/UX for the pathway builder using **React** and **Ant Design**, reducing completion time by **30%**.
Implemented a notification system utilizing **RabbitMQ**, achieving **99%** timely alert delivery for patient reminders.
Established seamless CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, reducing deployment times by **80%**.
Containerized microservices using **Docker**, which streamlined deployment processes across both staging and production environments.
Managed services on **AWS EKS** using **Terraform**, maintaining a **99.9%** uptime while optimizing load handling with **Redis** caching.
Ensured comprehensive testing coverage with tools such as **JUnit**, **Mockito**, **Cucumber**, and **Selenium**, leading to increased system reliability and reduced bugs in production.

Leveraged **Java** (Spring Boot) and **Node.js** to develop robust backend services, enhancing system response times for ticketing and customer support by **25%**.
Implemented a notification system utilizing **Kafka** for real-time alerts, achieving a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues.
Designed and developed a customer insights dashboard with **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, resulting in a **20%** improvement in resolution rates.
Automated CI/CD processes with **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a reliable and consistent release process.
Deployed the platform on **AWS EC2** using **Docker** and **Terraform**, reducing infrastructure setup time by **50%**.
Integrated automated testing frameworks like **JUnit**, **Mockito**, and **Cucumber** to enhance code quality and reliability.
Utilized **Grafana** and **Splunk** for monitoring system performance and troubleshooting issues efficiently, supporting a proactive approach to system management.

Developed and maintained **microservices architecture** utilizing **Java** with **Spring Boot** and **Hibernate**, achieving **98%** uptime.
Implemented responsive frontend solutions using **Angular**, resulting in an improvement of load times by **40%**.
Led comprehensive testing strategies employing **JUnit**, **Mockito**, and **Cucumber**, which decreased bugs by **30%**.
Optimized application performance with techniques such as code splitting and lazy loading, yielding a **15%** reduction in load times.
Successfully deployed applications globally using **AWS CloudFront** and **S3**, ensuring low-latency access and reliability.
Utilized version control and CI/CD tools such as **BitBucket**, **Jenkins**, and **Ansible** to streamline software delivery processes.
Leveraged **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, enhancing scalability and deployment efficiency.

skills:
**Programming Languages**
	Java, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

 **Backend Frameworks**
	Spring Boot, Spring, Tomcat, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

 **Frontend Frameworks**
	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

	RESTful API design, Microservices Architecture, Monolith Architecture

 **Databases**
	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB, Oracle, ElasticSearch

 **DevOps**
	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline, BitBucket, Ansible, TeamCity, Grafana, Splunk, jUnit, Mockito, Cucumber, Selenium, LoadRunner, JMeter, Gradle, Maven, Npm

 **Cloud & Infrastructure**
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3, Lambda), API Gateway, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack, Windows, Linux
